comment.body:
人类应该生活在太空中而离开地球。它们必须生活在其他星球，卫星和太空殖民地/栖息地上，然后在地球上灭绝。您为什么认为整个人类都应该灭绝？

Rénlèi yīnggāi shēnghuó zài tàikōng zhōng ér líkāi dìqiú. Tāmen bìxū shēnghuó zài qítā xīngqiú, wèixīng hé tàikōng zhímíndì/qīxī dìshàng, ránhòu zài dìqiú shàng mièjué. Nín wèishéme rènwéi zhěnggè rénlèi dōu yīnggāi mièjué?

humans should live in space and leave earth. they need to be extinct on earth while living on other planets, moons and space colonies/habitats. why do you think all of humanity should be extinct in general?
zeronet has been very easy to use, i like it a lot.
